title: Auto Collision Coverage
text: Covers physical damage to the insured vehicle resulting from a collision with another vehicle or object. Deductibles apply. Claims over $5,000 may require an adjuster inspection.

title: Property Water Damage
text: Covers sudden and accidental water damage from burst pipes. Does not cover gradual leaks or mold remediation unless caused by a covered peril.

title: General Policy Conditions
text: All claims must be filed within 30 days of the incident date. Provide supporting documentation and photos when available.
